snippet.title: They (Metropolis/CD Projekt) - All Gameplay footage [Cancelled FPS Game]
snippet.description:
All the gameplay and trailers of the unreleased first person shooter "They" for Playstation 3, Xbox 360 and PC.

They was announced during E3 2007. The developer, Metropolis Software, was expected to release They some time in 2010. The game's story is very unique involving alien creatures that mind control machines and cyborgs, who have invaded England. features one weapon that has hundreds and thousands of combinations of parts that the player can pick up. Therefore the weapon can become a laser mini-gun to a napalm cannon. It can be fitted with scopes, different barrels and different types of ammo and firing mechanisms. 

In 2009 Metropolis was acquired by CD Projekt. They was subsequently cancelled and the team began to work on Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings.

(Source: https://www.giantbomb.com/they/3030-24963/)
